_sText:
Well, I was going through the servers when I spotted sliderace_city.
It was cool so I thought I wanted to take a crack at this.

So here it is my first slide map
I might release more versions and maps.

sorry about the quality of the screenshots if your wondering. I don't know what happened there with my screenshot taking but it looks ALOT more detailed ingame.

At the end there is a shotgun and a deagle but be careful when rushing towards it hehe.
Not as hard as sliderace_city, but pretty fun in my opinion.

Teleport at the end of map going back to T or CT spawn to do map over again or go hunt people with your shotty.






please tell me what you think, i need to know what i need to improve on, and if I should make a better version of this map.



Don't fall in the dich and watch out for traps!
